thread.title: Which Justin Timberlake Hot 100 Hit Is Your Favorite? Vote!
thread.title_full: Which Justin Timberlake Hot 100 Hit Is Your Favorite? Vote!

author: Taylor Weatherby
title: Which Justin Timberlake Hot 100 Hit Is Your Favorite? Vote!
text:
Christopher Polk/Getty Images for DirecTV Justin Timberlake performs on Feb. 2, 2013 in New Orleans.Ã‚ 
As we say goodbye to the first month of 2017, we also have an important birthday to celebrate: Justin Timberlake turned 36 on Tuesday (Jan. 31). 
While longtime fans may be more likely to blast JT classics like "Rock Your Body" or "Senorita" on his birthday, others may feel more inclined to play his latest chart-topping song or more recent hits such as "Can't Stop the Feeling!" or "Mirrors." Then again, Timberlake's heyday was arguably in 2006, when he scored three Billboard Hot 100 No. 1s in a row: "SexyBack,""My Love" and "What Goes Around...Comes Around," so perhaps most fans will lean toward those? Needless to say, he has plenty to choose from. 
So, to commemorate Timberlake's big day, Billboard is recognizing all of the Hot 100 hits -- 17, to be exact -- the singer has created since his post- *NSYNC days began in 2002 by finding out which one most fans want to put on repeat. Vote for your favorite JT hit below!
